column4: i cant find a guide out on how to keybind terminal to mod4 key
i had no luck binding to mod4, i used mod4+space instead.
i believe under the Desktop section, there is something called "Run a terminal" that will open a new gnome-terminal window
i keybound it to the terminal but when i use the shortcut it doesn't pop up?... :s
i got it working, had to add a new keyline and add gnome-terminal, the default didn't work.
haha, very weird! thanks for the tip :)
actually, is there any way i can make it so i only hae to use mod4 (win key), rather than mod4+space?
it doesn't do anything if i only click mod4, but if i do a combo it works :s
i've tried that many times on ubuntu :( never got it to work
okay, if i figure it out ill be sure to tell you.
ok, but /msg it to me or i will miss it!
